thread.title: Victim's sister warns American strangler dumped on UK after Brit aides campaigned for his release is still 'a danger to public'
thread.title_full: Victim's sister warns American strangler dumped on UK after Brit aides campaigned for his release is still 'a danger to public'

title: Victim's sister warns American strangler dumped on UK after Brit aides campaigned for his release is still 'a danger to public'
text:
Opinion 'he'll kill again' Victim’s sister warns American strangler dumped on UK after Brit aides campaigned for his release is still ‘a danger to public’ 
Murderer Dempsey Hawkins denied parole nine times since being jailed for murder of his 14-year-old girlfriend in 1970s, but chiefs eventually agreed to free him if he was deported to UK Sun Investigation BY JAMES BEAL, CARRI-ANN TAYLOR AND ALEX DIAZ 26th February 2017, 10:52 pm
